message.name: ERR_RESOLUTION_MUST_BE_UNIQUE
message.locale: This resolution exists already. Resolution must be unique.

message.name: ERR_RESOLUTION_CANNOT_BE_DELETED_ASSOCIATED_WITH_ISSUE
message.locale: This resolution cannot be deleted as it has been associated with an issue.

message.name: ERR_DELETE_RESOLUTION_ASSOCIATED_WITH_INVESTIGATION
message.locale: This resolution cannot be deleted as it has been associated with an investigation.

message.name: ERR_DELETE_RESOLUTION_ASSOCIATED_WITH_CASE
message.locale: This resolution cannot be deleted as there are active resolutions of this type associated with cases.

message.name: ERR_DELETE_RESOLUTION_ASSOCIATED_WITH_CASE_TYPE
message.locale: This resolution cannot be removed as there are active resolutions of this type associated with cases of type %1s.
